name: Frogotten Taxes
description:
Description

Have you ever wanted to collect taxes with your best friend? No? Well here's a game about tax collection anyways!

In Frogotten Taxes, you play as two frog friends collecting taxes from a procedurally-generated building. Set in the post-impressionistic era, these fancy amphibians need to climb up the endless tower of tax-payers. What can go wrong if you have the power of friendship by your side?

This game was made under 42 hours as a part of the annual Nordic Game Jam 2022 by students from Breda University of Applied Sciences.

Our game jam themes were:

- Connection

- Taxing

- Post-Impressionism

Controls

This game is suitable for both Mouse & Keyboard and Controller. 

Frogotten Taxes is a co-op game. It means that the game can be played with up to two players.

Note: If you attended NGJ 2022, this game is playable with the handed-out controller. However, only one can be connected at the time.

Setups need to look as follows:

  • 1 Mouse & Keyboard and 1 Controller
  • 2 Controllers

Gamepad
Left Thumbstick --- Move
Right Trigger / A (Xbox) / X (Playstation) --- Grab

Mouse & Keyboard
A / D --- Move
Spacebar --- Grab

How to Play

Download the .zip file and extract the folder within. When extracted, run FrogottenTaxes.exe to play the game.
